title: Fivestar4everMVP
author: Fivestar4everMVP
content: Nothing unique, just a simple idea I thought about, and I think it's very feasible, and not only will it allow me to still promote my services on this forum, but it possibly will take away the eyes of the authority from my service.If I owned a bitcoin mixing service, and since Bitcoin mixing services have been banned from being promoted on this forum, in other to keep promoting my service on this forum, I would build a really good  bitcoin wallet with lots of features, and include bitcoin mixing service as one of the features, but this particular feature will be hidden in the wallet, and to access it, I will come up with a trick.With this, I will continue promoting my service on this forum, no longer as a bitcoin mixer, but as an innocent bitcoin wallet, meanwhile, hidden inside the wallet is a bitcoin mixing service.This way, bitcointalk.org won't be implicated if any thing happens, since users here were technically and practically promoting a bitcoin wallet, not a mixer.What do you guys think.?

comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on December 01, 2023, 08:35:01 PMWell, maybe I have to give up here  Well, better lock this thread if you give up your idea, I don't think any kind of manipulation to promote a mixer here will succeed we have the community looking at every project that is being promoted here and we have the moderators checking the announcement since Bitcoin mixer is a hot topic now, they will see to it that the community will comply and any members will try to manipulate in promoting a mixer will get an outright ban.The community was ok when there were very few mixers being promoted here, there will be more projects that will come here and utilize Bitcointalk's popularity to promote their project, after January 2 the casino platforms will be the major advertisers here in the signature campaign, I just hope many casinos old and new will launch their campaign here, so we can incentivize quality posters that once part of mixing campaign.
